meanings.definition: Move with a smooth, wavelike motion.
meanings.sent1: The snake undulating through the grass caught my attention.
meanings.sent2: The flag undulating in the wind was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The undulating dance of the flames in the campfire mesmerized us all.
meanings.sent4: The undulating melody of the music carried us away to a dreamy place.
meanings.sent5: The undulating river flowed gently through the valley, reflecting the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Having a rising and falling motion or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The undulating hills in the distance looked like waves frozen in time.
meanings.sent2: The undulating road ahead made for a bumpy ride.
meanings.sent3: The undulating pattern on the fabric gave the dress a unique texture.
meanings.sent4: The undulating clouds in the sky painted a picturesque scene.
meanings.sent5: The undulating motion of the dancer's dress added grace to her performance.
